sentences.sContent: Children who play truant from school are unimaginative.
sentences.sContent_eng: Children who play truant from school are unimaginative.
sentences.sCn: 逃学的孩子们都缺乏想像力。

sentences.sContent: To him, home was just like a hell.So he began to play truant and then at last he left his home.
sentences.sContent_eng: To him, home was just like a hell.So he began to play truant and then at last he left his home.
sentences.sCn: 对他来说，家就像地狱一般。 于是这个孩子开始逃学然后索性离家出走。

sentences.sContent: That's why I have asked our social policy review to look into whether we should cut the benefits of those parents whose children constantly play truant.
sentences.sContent_eng: That's why I have asked our social policy review to look into whether we should cut the benefits of those parents whose children constantly play truant.
sentences.sCn: 这就是我要求反思我们的社会政策，决定要不要取消那些经常逃学的孩子的父母相关的福利。
